text: hi everyone I'm Katie super-simple goes
live on the super simple songs live
stream every Tuesday at 1 p.m. Eastern
Time
we sing all your favorite super simple
songs and try out some fun activities
too you can interact with us on the live
chat and I try and give a special shout
out to as many people as I can to join
us for our next live stream subscribe to
super simple songs and ring the bell
what that means is click the subscribe
button and then you'll see a bell icon
appear next to the subscribe button
click on the Bell select all and then
save that way you'll get a notification
every time we go live and you'll never
miss it join us and our friends from all
over the world for our weekly sing-along
see you on Tuesday
